channel.title: Cool SMF forum, Customized! (AND NICE RSPS CROWNS)
channel.description:
Hey guys so I was experimenting in the art of website editing a bit while I noticed it wasn't too boring when making a site for my RSPS. So here are some of it's features. Please don't hate on it, It's my first one. Just constructive criticism or none at all please.
NOTE: I used 000webhost, If you upload these files to public the website will work 100%
- 718 Webclient - Reputation System - Edited Portal - News On Portal (Needs Administrator Approval) - Colored Names - Colored Ranks - Custom Rank Icons (About 10)
Webclient [IMG]http://i1326.photobucket.com/albums/u643/DemolitionxRsps/webby.png[/img]
Files [IMG]http://i1326.photobucket.com/albums/u643/DemolitionxRsps/2012-12-11_2035.png[/img]
Installed Packages [IMG]http://i1326.photobucket.com/albums/u643/DemolitionxRsps/Mods.png[/img]
Rank Icon Pictures [IMG]http://i1326.photobucket.com/albums/u643/DemolitionxRsps/Ranks.png[/img]
Main Portal [IMG]http://i1326.photobucket.com/albums/u643/DemolitionxRsps/Site.png[/img]
Forum Set Up [IMG]http://i1326.photobucket.com/albums/u643/DemolitionxRsps/Site_001.png[/img]
Main Site/Portal [IMG]http://i1326.photobucket.com/albums/u643/DemolitionxRsps/Site_002.png[/img]
Lower Forums [IMG]http://i1326.photobucket.com/albums/u643/DemolitionxRsps/Site_003.png[/img]
Simple Portal Admin Panel [IMG]http://i1326.photobucket.com/albums/u643/DemolitionxRsps/Site_004.png[/img]
Pictures and Colored Names Demonstration [IMG]http://i1326.photobucket.com/albums/u643/DemolitionxRsps/Site_005.png[/img]
Link: https://www.dropbox.com/s/c8x4evth2uib3lg/Website.rar Nice Crown List: https://www.dropbox.com/s/t5pz2ss3gjh52xe/Crowns.rar

item.dc:creator: @TheAmmoBandit TheAmmoBandit
item.description:
@TheAmmoBandit wrote:

Cool show off i guess. You also said you found out webdesign isn’t boring (well it isn’t boring so i have to agree on this), the only thing you did was using a webapplication and adding a few images to it (not that i don’t like it) but if you think that is webdesigning then you might have a wrong image of it

item.title: Cool SMF forum, Customized! (AND NICE RSPS CROWNS)
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

This isn’t anything special really, I can easily just go get those images from a website and follow instructions in the Admin panel of SMF and add them to user groups. Also, do note that you can’t just give someone your SMF installation, and expect it to work for them. The settings are set up differently, and all the image links that coordinate them with member groups, are stored in databases, which you didn’t include. This is pointless really, sorry. Also, be careful as you’ve just put information out by releasing this download, I could delete your website easily at this point. I suggest removing this before the wrong person gets a hold of it.

e6aeld.png908×828

Read full topic
item.source: Cool SMF forum, Customized! (AND NICE RSPS CROWNS)

Looks like a modified default SMF theme, but good work.
